attributes.action: CANCEL THE INCREASE IN THE AIRLINE PASSENGER DUTY
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At a time when the industry is strugling to survive the worst trading conditions in living memory, raisng the APD to almost double its current value is a stab in the back.  We airline emplyees are doing all we can to cut costs.  Including taking unpaid leave.  If my company goes bankrupt a lot of people will never vote Labour again.  The existing APD should be scrapped nor increased.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
